channel.title: Regionclipping

item.title: Regionclipping
item.dc:creator: @ravekitty ravekitty
item.description:
@ravekitty wrote:

Any time i try to add region clipping to something…
It doesn’t even walk.
this is how im using it in one of the classes

 if (Region.getClipping(c.getX() - 1, c.getY(), c.heightLevel, -1, 0)) {
			c.getPA().walkTo(-1, 0);
		} else if (Region.getClipping(c.getX() + 1, c.getY(), c.heightLevel, 1, 0)) {
			c.getPA().walkTo(1, 0);
		} else if (Region.getClipping(c.getX(), c.getY() - 1, c.heightLevel, 0, -1)) {
			c.getPA().walkTo(0, -1);
		} else if (Region.getClipping(c.getX(), c.getY() + 1, c.heightLevel, 0, 1)) {
			c.getPA().walkTo(0, 1);
		}

Read full topic
